Posts.Content: Tricia, Go to www.her2support.org It is an online support group for women like you. There is tons of information there on HER2, Herceptin, clinical trials, tests, etc. Be sure to visit the message board. Post any questions or concerns that you have and they will be answered almost immediately by bc survivors. Hugs Christine
Posts.Title: Herceptin and Her-2pos Breast Cancer

Posts.Content: Carole, You may want to try posting on www.her2support.org This is a website for HER2 positive women and run by a HER2 bc survivor.
Posts.Title: Her2 Positive
